padsof.gui.utils

Class FormGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • padsof.gui.utils.FormGenerator

  • public class FormGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Generate a form automatically using label names. This class supports fluent/fluid syntax, so most methods return the instance itself.
    Author:
    Víctor de Juan Sanz - Guillermo Julián Moreno
